statements: SELECT * FROM CreditInquiries;
SELECT customer_id, inquiry_date FROM CreditInquiries WHERE approval_status = TRUE;
SELECT inquiry_id, customer_id FROM CreditInquiries ORDER BY inquiry_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CreditInquiries WHERE inquiry_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM CreditInquiries WHERE inquiry_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CreditInquiries WHERE approval_status = TRUE
SELECT inquiry_id, customer_id, inquiry_date FROM CreditInquiries WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY inquiry_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(inquiry_id) AS total_inquiries FROM CreditInquiries GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_inquiries > 5
SELECT * FROM CreditInquiries WHERE inquiry_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' AND approval_status = FALSE
SELECT customer_id, MAX(inquiry_date) AS latest_inquiry_date FROM CreditInquiries GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY latest_inquiry_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Credit_Inquiries;
SELECT inquiry_id, customer_id, inquiry_reason FROM Credit_Inquiries WHERE inquiry_date >= '2021-09-01';
SELECT inquiry_id, inquiry_reason FROM Credit_Inquiries WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM Credit_Approvals WHERE approval_amount > 1000;
SELECT approval_id, customer_id, approval_amount, approval_date FROM Credit_Approvals ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Credit_Inquiries WHERE inquiry_reason = 'Credit check';
SELECT * FROM Credit_Inquiries WHERE inquiry_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY inquiry_date DESC;
SELECT approval_amount, approval_date FROM Credit_Approvals WHERE approval_amount > 5000 ORDER BY approval_amount ASC, approval_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(approval_amount) AS max_approval FROM Credit_Approvals GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_inquiries FROM Credit_Inquiries GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT * FROM CreditInquiries ORDER BY inquiry_date DESC, inquiry_id ASC;
SELECT inquiry_id, inquiry_date, inquiry_status FROM CreditInquiries WHERE inquiry_status = 'Pending';
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM CreditBehavior WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT approval_id, approval_status FROM CreditApprovals JOIN CreditInquiries ON CreditApprovals.inquiry_id = CreditInquiries.inquiry_id WHERE CreditApprovals.approval_status = 'Approved';
SELECT c.customer_id, c.total_inquiries, a.approval_status FROM CreditBehavior c LEFT JOIN CreditApprovals a ON c.customer_id = a.inquiry_id ORDER BY c.total_inquiries DESC;
SELECT * FROM CreditInquiries WHERE inquiry_status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM CreditApprovals WHERE approval_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT CreditBehavior.customer_id, CreditBehavior.credit_score, CreditApprovals.approval_status FROM CreditBehavior JOIN CreditApprovals ON CreditBehavior.customer_id = CreditApprovals.inquiry_id;

SELECT CreditInquiries.*, CreditApprovals.approval_status FROM CreditInquiries JOIN CreditApprovals ON CreditInquiries.inquiry_id = CreditApprovals.inquiry_id WHERE CreditInquiries.inquiry_status = 'Pending' AND CreditApprovals.approval_status = 'Approved';

SELECT CreditBehavior.customer_id, CreditBehavior.total_inquiries, CreditApprovals.approval_date FROM CreditBehavior JOIN CreditApprovals ON CreditBehavior.customer_id = CreditApprovals.inquiry_id WHERE CreditBehavior.credit_score > 700 ORDER BY CreditApprovals.approval_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT inquiry_id, inquiry_date, inquiry_amount FROM CreditInquiries WHERE inquiry_amount > 1000;
SELECT c.customer_name, ci.inquiry_date, ca.approval_date FROM CreditInquiries ci JOIN CreditApprovals ca ON ci.inquiry_id = ca.inquiry_id JOIN Customers c ON ci.customer_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT ch.customer_id, ch.inquiry_id, ch.approval_status, c.customer_name FROM CreditHistory ch JOIN Customers c ON ch.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE ch.approval_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM Customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT c.customer_name, h.approval_status FROM Customers c INNER JOIN CreditHistory h ON c.customer_id = h.customer_id WHERE h.approval_status = TRUE;
SELECT c.customer_name, COUNT(h.history_id) AS total_inquiries FROM Customers c LEFT JOIN CreditHistory h ON c.customer_id = h.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_name;
SELECT ci.inquiry_date, ca.approval_date FROM CreditInquiries ci LEFT JOIN CreditApprovals ca ON ci.inquiry_id = ca.inquiry_id WHERE ci.inquiry_amount > 1000 ORDER BY ci.inquiry_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CreditInquiries;
SELECT enquiry_id, customer_id, inquiry_date FROM CreditApprovals ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT approval_id, inquiry_id, approval_amount FROM CreditApprovals WHERE approval_amount >= 10000;
SELECT customer_id, score, calculation_date FROM CreditScores WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY calculation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT history_text FROM CreditHistory WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT approval_amount FROM CreditApprovals WHERE approval_amount > 5000 ORDER BY approval_amount ASC;
SELECT customer_name, inquiry_date, approval_status FROM Customers JOIN CreditInquiries ON Customers.customer_id = CreditInquiries.customer_id;
